actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1407(h) of title 28, United States Code, to permit the consolidation of related, multidistrict civil antitrust actions for both pretrial and trial purposes.

summary.text: Amends the judicial code to authorize the Judicial Panel on Multidistrict Litigation to consolidate any action brought under the Clayton Act for both pretrial and trial purposes.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1407(h) of title 28, United States Code, to permit the consolidation of related, multidistrict civil antitrust actions for both pretrial and trial purposes.
